name: Kotoba Questo
description:
WASD to move, Space to attack.

✨✨Let’s Japanese from a complete beginner!✨✨

Kotoba Questo will develop your ability to read Japanese words, while you’re playing it. Explore the dungeon and match the pictures for each word you find.

- 3 Word Packs for free, including Hiragana, Katakana, animals(coming soon) so no prior japanese needed!
- Beautiful and Charming 16 bit art style
- Low graphic means low violence (no blood)

🏜️🧊🌲 🗺️ Infinite Dungeon ( 3 Styles ) 🗺️ 🏜️🧊🌲

There are 3 styles of dungeons to explore, each with different music and monsters and every Level is generated randomly to allow for infinite play!

🤔 Learning 🤔
Your correct matches are saved every time you play so you always get new japanese words to test your knowledge.

👹 Watch out 👹
if you get the answer wrong, you will have to face the demon lord but don't worry you strong enough to beat it.

😴😴😴😴 Engaging 😲😲😲😲🎓🎓🎓🎓

This game is a great way to start your child learning new words and symbols to make learning language in the future easier. Repetitive study can be hard for younger children so making it fun and easy with retro sound effects keeps them engaged so they can learn a long the way
